alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:39PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Dale, northern Henry, northwestern Clay, northern Randolph, Quitman and northwestern Terrell Counties through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 139 PM EDT/1239 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weston to Georgetown to near Doster. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cuthbert, Georgetown, Parrott, Wire Bridge, Walter F George Lake, Edwin, Standleys Store, Watson Crossroads, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Crossroads, Ricks Place, Arguta, Thomas Mill Creek, Phillips Crossroads, Chambliss, Hatcher, Morris, Benevolence and Springvale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
